devdoc.author: PredictX

OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params.token: Address of ERC20 token to withdraw, or address(0) for ETH

devdoc.title: PredictionFactory - Deployment hub and registry for prediction markets

PredictionCreated(uint256,address,addres.notice: Event emitted when a new prediction is created

getPredictionOutcome(uint256).notice: Returns outcome of a specific prediction

getUserPredictions(address).notice: Returns list of prediction ids created by user

predictionCount().notice: Total number of created predictions (and latest id)

predictions(uint256).notice: Registry mapping from id to prediction address

userPredictions(address,uint256).notice: Tracks predictions created by a user

withdrawProtocolFees(address).notice: Withdraw accumulated protocol fees (ERC20 or ETH) to the owner
